title: The Awakening
description: ** This Book is out of print ** Please See- Seraphina's Awakening for Current Publication.For as long as she can remember, Sera has experienced these visions that made her feel like there was more to life. It wasn’t until one moment, one accident that her life changed forever. She awakens the next day a new person in more ways than one and with no recollection of the night’s events. She’s forced to adapt to certain sensations she is experiencing all while trying to piece together what exactly happened to her that fateful night. Her strange, hectic life doesn’t seem to make sense until she meets a handsome stranger and the puzzle finally seems to slowly piece itself together. But, what she doesn’t expect is the new powers she has developed attracting all kinds of unwanted attention. Thrown into a world she never truly believed existed she is forced to come to grips with who she is becoming while staying out of trouble long enough to figure out what needs to be done to fulfill her destiny.
author: Sheena Hutchinson
